name: jshighlight
description: Synchronously highlight code in the browser.

scripts.build: tsc && rimraf lib && mkdir lib && rm -f temp/app/*.map temp/app/parsers/*.map && cp -R temp/app/* lib/ && rm -f lib/*.spec.* lib/parsers/*.spec.* && cp src/app/index.d.ts lib/
